languages.text: Союз династии фон Валанциус и кабала Черного Сердца, заключенный над остывающим трупом Маражая Эзирраеша, не продлился долго, и плоды его были отравлены. Натравливая бесчестных ксеносов на своих врагов, Вольный Торговец и сам{mf||а} не был{mf||а} застрахован{mf||а} от кинжалов, вонзенных в спину. Не раз и не два друкари совершали попытки тайно устранить Лорд-капитана и подчинить династию. Оставив надежду на длительный альянс, Вольный Торговец ответил{mf||а} нелюдям коварством на коварство и нанес{mf||ла} удар, вероломно истребив многих воинов-кабалитов и взяв богатейшие трофеи.

The alliance between the von Valancius dynasty and the Kabal of the Black Heart, forged over the cooling corpse of Marazhai Aezyrraesh, was short-lived and the fruits of the union poisoned. By setting nefarious xenos against {mf|his|her} enemies, the Rogue Trader also left {mf|himself|herself} vulnerable to daggers in the back. More than once or twice, the Drukhari made attempts to secretly eliminate the Lord Captain and seize control of the dynasty. Abandoning hope of a lasting alliance, the Rogue Trader answered the inhumans' deviousness with {mf|his|her} own, treacherously slaying many Kabalite warriors and claiming the richest trophies.
languages.original_text: Союз династии фон Валанциус и кабала Черного Сердца, заключенный над остывающим трупом Маражая Эзирраеша, не продлился долго, и плоды его были отравлены. Натравливая бесчестных ксеносов на своих врагов, Вольный Торговец и сам{mf||а} не был{mf||а} застрахован{mf||а} от кинжалов, вонзенных в спину. Не раз и не два друкари совершали попытки тайно устранить Лорд-капитана и подчинить династию. Оставив надежду на длительный альянс, Вольный Торговец ответил{mf||а} нелюдям коварством на коварство и нанес{mf||ла} удар, вероломно истребив многих воинов-кабалитов и взяв богатейшие трофеи.

The alliance between the von Valancius dynasty and the Kabal of the Black Heart, forged over the cooling corpse of Marazhai Aezyrraesh, was short-lived and the fruits of the union poisoned. By setting nefarious xenos against {mf|his|her} enemies, the Rogue Trader also left {mf|himself|herself} vulnerable to daggers in the back. More than once or twice, the Drukhari made attempts to secretly eliminate the Lord Captain and seize control of the dynasty. Abandoning hope of a lasting alliance, the Rogue Trader answered the inhumans' deviousness with {mf|his|her} own, treacherously slaying many Kabalite warriors and claiming the richest trophies.

languages.text: L'alliance entre la dynastie von Valancius et la Kabale du Cœur Noir, nouée sur le cadavre encore chaud de Marazhai Aezyrraesh, fut de courte durée et porta des fruits empoisonnés. En se servant des ignobles xénos pour attaquer ses ennemis, {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} s'exposa {mf|lui-même|elle-même} à des manœuvres insidieuses. Les Drukharis tentèrent plus d'une fois de l'éliminer secrètement et de prendre le contrôle de la dynastie. Puisqu'une alliance durable n'était pas envisageable, {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} répliqua avec la même perfidie que les non-humains, tuant sournoisement de nombreux guerriers kabalites et s'emparant des plus beaux trophées.
languages.original_text: The alliance between the von Valancius dynasty and the Kabal of the Black Heart, forged over the cooling corpse of Marazhai Aezyrraesh, was short-lived and the fruits of the union poisoned. By setting nefarious xenos against {mf|his|her} enemies, the Rogue Trader also left {mf|himself|herself} vulnerable to daggers in the back. More than once or twice, the Drukhari made attempts to secretly eliminate the Lord Captain and seize control of the dynasty. Abandoning hope of a lasting alliance, the Rogue Trader answered the inhumans' deviousness with {mf|his|her} own, treacherously slaying many Kabalite warriors and claiming the richest trophies.

traits.locale_text: L'alliance entre la dynastie von Valancius et la Kabale du Cœur Noir, nouée sur le cadavre encore chaud de Marazhai Aezyrraesh, fut de courte durée et porta des fruits empoisonnés. En se servant des ignobles xénos pour attaquer ses ennemis, {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} s'exposa {mf|lui-même|elle-même} à des manœuvres insidieuses. Les Drukharis tentèrent plus d'une fois de l'éliminer secrètement et de prendre le contrôle de la dynastie. Puisqu'une alliance durable n'était pas envisageable, {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} répliqua avec la même perfidie que les non-humains, tuant sournoisement de nombreux guerriers kabalites et s'emparant des plus beaux trophées.

languages.text: Das Bündnis zwischen der Dynastie derer von Valancius und der Kabale des Schwarzen Herzens — geschmiedet über dem abkühlenden Leichnam von Marazhai Aezyrraesh — war nur von kurzer Dauer, und die Früchte der Union waren vergiftet. Indem {mf|er|sie} schändliche Xenos gegen {mf|seine|ihre} Feinde ins Feld geführt hat, hat {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} sich auch selbst anfällig für Dolche im Rücken gemacht. Die Drukhari haben mehr als nur einmal den Versuch unternommen, den Lord Captain heimlich zu eliminieren und die Kontrolle über die Dynastie an sich zu reißen. {mf|Der Freihändler|Die Freihändlerin} gab die Hoffnung auf eine dauerhafte Allianz auf und antwortete auf die Tücke der Unmenschen mit eigener Tücke. {mf|Er|Sie} tötete hinterhältig zahlreiche Krieger der Kabale und riss sich die wertvollsten Trophäen unter den Nagel.
languages.original_text: The alliance between the von Valancius dynasty and the Kabal of the Black Heart, forged over the cooling corpse of Marazhai Aezyrraesh, was short-lived and the fruits of the union poisoned. By setting nefarious xenos against {mf|his|her} enemies, the Rogue Trader also left {mf|himself|herself} vulnerable to daggers in the back. More than once or twice, the Drukhari made attempts to secretly eliminate the Lord Captain and seize control of the dynasty. Abandoning hope of a lasting alliance, the Rogue Trader answered the inhumans' deviousness with {mf|his|her} own, treacherously slaying many Kabalite warriors and claiming the richest trophies.

traits.locale_text: Das Bündnis zwischen der Dynastie derer von Valancius und der Kabale des Schwarzen Herzens — geschmiedet über dem abkühlenden Leichnam von Marazhai Aezyrraesh — war nur von kurzer Dauer, und die Früchte der Union waren vergiftet. Indem {mf|er|sie} schändliche Xenos gegen {mf|seine|ihre} Feinde ins Feld geführt hat, hat {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} sich auch selbst anfällig für Dolche im Rücken gemacht. Die Drukhari haben mehr als nur einmal den Versuch unternommen, den Lord Captain heimlich zu eliminieren und die Kontrolle über die Dynastie an sich zu reißen. {mf|Der Freihändler|Die Freihändlerin} gab die Hoffnung auf eine dauerhafte Allianz auf und antwortete auf die Tücke der Unmenschen mit eigener Tücke. {mf|Er|Sie} tötete hinterhältig zahlreiche Krieger der Kabale und riss sich die wertvollsten Trophäen unter den Nagel.

languages.text: La alianza entre la dinastía von Valancius y la Kábala del Corazón Negro, forjada sobre el cadáver aún caliente de Marazhai Aezyrraesh, fue breve y sus frutos, venenosos. Al enviar a los viles xenos contra sus enemigos, {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente también se expuso a sus puñaladas traperas. En repetidas ocasiones, los Drukhari intentaron eliminar en secreto a{mf|l| la} Lord Capitán. Abandonando toda esperanza de una alianza duradera, {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente respondió a la astucia de los inhumanos con la suya, acabando a traición con numerosos Kabalistas y cobrándose grandes trofeos.
languages.original_text: The alliance between the von Valancius dynasty and the Kabal of the Black Heart, forged over the cooling corpse of Marazhai Aezyrraesh, was short-lived and the fruits of the union poisoned. By setting nefarious xenos against {mf|his|her} enemies, the Rogue Trader also left {mf|himself|herself} vulnerable to daggers in the back. More than once or twice, the Drukhari made attempts to secretly eliminate the Lord Captain and seize control of the dynasty. Abandoning hope of a lasting alliance, the Rogue Trader answered the inhumans' deviousness with {mf|his|her} own, treacherously slaying many Kabalite warriors and claiming the richest trophies.

traits.locale_text: La alianza entre la dinastía von Valancius y la Kábala del Corazón Negro, forjada sobre el cadáver aún caliente de Marazhai Aezyrraesh, fue breve y sus frutos, venenosos. Al enviar a los viles xenos contra sus enemigos, {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente también se expuso a sus puñaladas traperas. En repetidas ocasiones, los Drukhari intentaron eliminar en secreto a{mf|l| la} Lord Capitán. Abandonando toda esperanza de una alianza duradera, {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente respondió a la astucia de los inhumanos con la suya, acabando a traición con numerosos Kabalistas y cobrándose grandes trofeos.

languages.text: マラズハイ・アエジレシュの冷たい亡骸をめぐって結ばれたフォン・ヴァランシウス王朝と 陰謀団〈黒き心臓〉との同盟は短命に終わり、その結束の果実は毒入りだった。残虐な異種族を敵に差し向けたことで、自由開拓者は背後からの刃に対し脆弱になっていたのだ。一度や二度ならず、デュカーリは密かにロード・キャプテンを抹殺して王朝の支配権を握ろうと画策した。同盟を継続するという希望を捨て去ったロード・キャプテンは、非人間種族の狡猾さに自らの狡猾さでもって応じた。カバライト・ウォリアーの多くを裏切りによって殺害し、最も豪華な戦利品を獲得したのであった。
languages.original_text: The alliance between the von Valancius dynasty and the Kabal of the Black Heart, forged over the cooling corpse of Marazhai Aezyrraesh, was short-lived and the fruits of the union poisoned. By setting nefarious xenos against {mf|his|her} enemies, the Rogue Trader also left {mf|himself|herself} vulnerable to daggers in the back. More than once or twice, the Drukhari made attempts to secretly eliminate the Lord Captain and seize control of the dynasty. Abandoning hope of a lasting alliance, the Rogue Trader answered the inhumans' deviousness with {mf|his|her} own, treacherously slaying many Kabalite warriors and claiming the richest trophies.

traits.locale_text: マラズハイ・アエジレシュの冷たい亡骸をめぐって結ばれたフォン・ヴァランシウス王朝と 陰謀団〈黒き心臓〉との同盟は短命に終わり、その結束の果実は毒入りだった。残虐な異種族を敵に差し向けたことで、自由開拓者は背後からの刃に対し脆弱になっていたのだ。一度や二度ならず、デュカーリは密かにロード・キャプテンを抹殺して王朝の支配権を握ろうと画策した。同盟を継続するという希望を捨て去ったロード・キャプテンは、非人間種族の狡猾さに自らの狡猾さでもって応じた。カバライト・ウォリアーの多くを裏切りによって殺害し、最も豪華な戦利品を獲得したのであった。

languages.text: 冯·瓦兰修斯王朝与黑心阴谋团之间的联盟建立在玛拉斋·艾泽拉什冰冷的尸身之上，然而联盟本身并不长久，也没有取得太多成果。行商浪人让邪恶的黑暗灵族对付他的敌人，但自己也遭到了黑暗灵族的阴谋暗算。黑暗灵族多次试图刺杀行商浪人，将王朝的控制权掌握在自己手中。行商浪人挫败了他们的阴谋之后，放弃了与他们建立长久联盟的打算，转而以自己的方式应对那些狡诈的敌人。行商浪人通过奸诈的手段杀死了许多阴谋团战士，夺走了那些最有价值的战利品。
languages.original_text: The alliance between the von Valancius dynasty and the Kabal of the Black Heart, forged over the cooling corpse of Marazhai Aezyrraesh, was short-lived and the fruits of the union poisoned. By setting nefarious xenos against {mf|his|her} enemies, the Rogue Trader also left {mf|himself|herself} vulnerable to daggers in the back. More than once or twice, the Drukhari made attempts to secretly eliminate the Lord Captain and seize control of the dynasty. Abandoning hope of a lasting alliance, the Rogue Trader answered the inhumans' deviousness with {mf|his|her} own, treacherously slaying many Kabalite warriors and claiming the richest trophies.

traits.locale_text: 冯·瓦兰修斯王朝与黑心阴谋团之间的联盟建立在玛拉斋·艾泽拉什冰冷的尸身之上，然而联盟本身并不长久，也没有取得太多成果。行商浪人让邪恶的黑暗灵族对付他的敌人，但自己也遭到了黑暗灵族的阴谋暗算。黑暗灵族多次试图刺杀行商浪人，将王朝的控制权掌握在自己手中。行商浪人挫败了他们的阴谋之后，放弃了与他们建立长久联盟的打算，转而以自己的方式应对那些狡诈的敌人。行商浪人通过奸诈的手段杀死了许多阴谋团战士，夺走了那些最有价值的战利品。

languages.text: Von Valancius hanedanlığı ve Kara Yürek Kabalı arasında, Marazhai Aezyrraesh'in cesedinin yanında yapılan ittifakın ömrü kısa, bu birlikteliğin meyveleri de zehirli oldu. Alçak zenoları düşmanlarına karşı kullanan Hür Tacir, bunu yaparak kendisini de sırtına saplanacak hançerlere karşı savunmasız bıraktı. Drukhariler, birden çok kez Lord Kaptan'ı saf dışı bırakmaya ve hanedanlığın kontrolünü ele geçirmeye teşebbüs etti. Kalıcı bir ittifak umudunu yitiren Hür Tacir; insan dışıların hainliğine kendi hainliğiyle cevap verdi, sayısız Kabalist savaşçıyı öldürdü ve güzel ganimetler topladı.
languages.original_text: The alliance between the von Valancius dynasty and the Kabal of the Black Heart, forged over the cooling corpse of Marazhai Aezyrraesh, was short-lived and the fruits of the union poisoned. By setting nefarious xenos against {mf|his|her} enemies, the Rogue Trader also left {mf|himself|herself} vulnerable to daggers in the back. More than once or twice, the Drukhari made attempts to secretly eliminate the Lord Captain and seize control of the dynasty. Abandoning hope of a lasting alliance, the Rogue Trader answered the inhumans' deviousness with {mf|his|her} own, treacherously slaying many Kabalite warriors and claiming the richest trophies.

traits.locale_text: Von Valancius hanedanlığı ve Siyah Yürek Kabalı arasında, Marazhai Aezyrraesh'in cesedinin yanında yapılan ittifak kısa ömürlüydü ve bu birlikteliğin meyveleri de zehirli oldu. Alçak zenoları düşmanlarına karşı kullanan Hür Tacir, bunu yaparak kendisini de sırtına saplanacak hançerlere karşı savunmasız bırakmıştı. Drukhariler birden fazla kez Lord Kaptan'ı saf dışı bırakmaya ve hanedanlığın kontrolünü ele geçirmeye teşebbüs etti. Kalıcı bir ittifak umutlarını bir kenara bırakan Hür Tacir, insan dışıların hainliğine kendi hainliğiyle cevap verdi, sayısız Kabalist savaşçı öldürdü ve zenginliklerini ganimet olarak kendisine aldı.
